sentences.en: But this does not vitiate his scholarship.
sentences.cn: 但这不会威胁到他的奖学金。

sentences.en: No such Variation shall vitiate or invalidate this Contract.
sentences.cn: 任何该等变更都不会影响本合同或造成本合同失效.

sentences.en: Strategic policy during the War was vitiated because of a sharp division between easterners and westerners.
sentences.cn: 由于“东方人”和“西方人”间的巨大分歧，战争期间的战略方针没有得到切实的执行。

sentences.en: This may vitiate a literal translation.
sentences.cn: 这就会损害直译的价值。

trans.tran_en: to make something less effective or spoil it

trans.tran_cn: （使）削弱，（使）破坏，（使）损害，（使）无效
